DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this protocol is to to compare the clinical utility of two dosage tapering regimens in Buprenorphine/Naloxone stabilized subjects for opiate detoxification.
DOC.brief_title: Suboxone: (Buprenorphine/Naloxone) Comparison of Two Taper Schedules - 1
DOC.criteria: Females are not pregnant or lactating Subjects meet DSMIV criteria for opiate dependence, are medically and psychiatrically stable, and do not have a current history of benzodiazepine dependence abuse, dependence, or treatment
